resources.string: Your phone is ringing, stop it from here if you want
Insert the lost device phone number and its password
This contact has no phone number

ringUp will find a lost phone.
Just insert its phone number and the password associated.

In order to let other people to find your phone you have to set YOUR device passwordâ€¦
This app sends commands via SMS, in order to make the target phone ring.
We need to have access to Contacts in order to make a target number ring, choosing it from the Contact List.
